comments.en:
This printer is similar to the Canon BJC-8200 (but only 4-ink) and is reported to work with the same drivers (bj8*06n.upp in Ghostscript 6.50 and newer) in the 600 dpi mode. If you want to use Gimp-Print install this printer as the Canon BJC-8200 and choose 600 dpi resolution.

Consumables/Refills: 4 independent ink tanks
